Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a pale red-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393895) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393895)
